title: Predicting Liquidity-Aware Bond Yields using Causal GANs and Deep Reinforcement Learning with LLM Evaluation
author: Jaskaran Singh Walia (Vellore Institute of Technology), Aarush Sinha (Vellore Institute of Technology), Srinitish Srinivasan (Vellore Institute of Technology), Srihari Unnikrishnan (Vellore Institute of Technology), ...
relevance_why: The integration of Causal Generative Adversarial Networks (Causal GANs) and reinforcement learning could inspire new approaches in synthesizing audio data or other multimodal generation tasks, paralleling the authors' focus on innovative data generation methods.
background: The paper tackles the challenge of forecasting bond yields, which is complicated by data scarcity and nonlinear relationships between macroeconomic variables.
contribution: This paper introduces a novel framework combining Causal Generative Adversarial Networks and Soft Actor-Critic reinforcement learning to generate synthetic bond yield data, achieving improved predictive accuracy and market dynamics representation.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous models struggled with encapsulating market complexities, especially in less liquid bond categories and during abnormal market conditions.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work improves predictive performance by integrating advanced generative modeling and reinforcement learning, yielding a Mean Absolute Error of 0.103% in bond yield forecasts.

key_innovation: The unique integration of reinforcement learning with causal generation techniques enhances the reliability and usability of synthetic financial data.
real_world_impact: This framework potentially transforms bond trading strategies and risk management through improved forecasting accuracy, leading to better financial decision-making.

new_terms.Causal Generative Adversarial Networks: **Causal Generative Adversarial Networks (Causal GANs)** are a type of neural network that generates data based on identified causal relationships between variables, enhancing the realism of synthetic data.
